4.title: Superman, no. 1
4.author: [No author]
notes: Published no. C26, C28, C30, F4-F8, C61.
Numbers with C prefix share sequence with Limited Collectors' Edition and All-New Collectors' Edition.

Facsimile printings of: Action Comics #1 (C26), Detective Comics #27 (C28), Sensation Comics #1 (C30), Whiz Comics #2 (F4), Batman #1 (F5), Wonder Woman #1 (F6), All-Star Comics #3 (F7), Flash Comics #1 (F8), and Superman #1 (C61)

HOLDINGS: no. C26; C28; C30; F4-F8; C61 (1974-1978) 1. Superhero comics. I. Action Comics, no. 1. II. Detective Comics, no. 27. III. Sensation Comics, no. 1. IV. Whiz Comics, no. 2. V. Batman, no. 1. VI. Wonder Woman, no. 1. VII. All-Star Comics, no. 3. VIII. Flash Comics, no. 1. IX. Superman, no. 1. Call no.: PN6726.F35
